page.title: 09WILDLIFE
page.content: There are many foxes in the area. Foxes mostly steal young lambs from the fields.Foxes are snared or shot by gamekeepers.They are mostly seen arou- nd farms at night. They are pests to farmers and people who keep chickens. Polecats eat fish,rabbits or any lame bird.They live in rabbit holes or any old barns.To catch their fish they wait silently until a fish comes to the edge of the water, then grabs them. Weasels and stoats are much the same as polecats.They eat the same and live in the same places.Pigeons are pests to farmers they eat corn,peas or any- thing that is planted in fields or gardens.Squirrels eat nuts and eggs some times they attack pigeons and eat them.Stags are a sort of a golden colour and they have antlers on their heads.
